events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Your resume highlights relevant skills and experience that match this role well.
Your application has been reviewed and classified under the Engineering cluster based on your experience with software development and devops.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to oversee your application and guide you through the recruitment process.
The initial screening call went well; the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software engineering principles and relevant technologies.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically to scheduling the technical interview, expressing strong interest in the opportunity.
A technical interview has been scheduled for next week to assess the candidateâ€™s skills in software development and problem-solving.
